modName: Mikaelarps Alternate enchantments  --Feel Free To Request--
summary:
This will change severel enchantments in the game and i also make every single request i get

Diese Mod ändert einge Verzauberungen im Spiel und ich nehme auch Anfragen für weitere Änderungen entgegen.
descriptionHtml:
Hi this is my alternate enchantment mod ill be changing the enchantments on severel weps and armors

***NOTICE I WILL NOW ALSO EDIT SPELLS IF ANYONE IS INTRESTED***


U CAN FIND INFORMATION ON ALL THE DIFFERENT CHANGES IN THE CHANGELOG AT THE BUTTOM

in the start i only wanted to change the shrouded armor but i set up for requests and now this mod will cover whatever items i feel needs another enchantment or whatever u people want me to throw in a weapon or armor

il be editing both armor and weapons and if u want it spells
and when i say editing i mean both enchantments, base damage, weight, armor value and just abaut everything the wep/armour have to offer

I will not take any more cheat item requests

and if anyone could take pics of the mod in use an upload them thatl be very much apreciated as i dnt really have time to do so
**CHANGELOG**

ver. 1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod start
Added the \"shrouded armor harder to detect when sneaking\"
that changed the 50% poisen recistance to 25, 50 or 100% harder to detect when sneaking

ver. 2
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Added the \"stronger dawnbreaker enchantment\"
that changed dawnbreakers base dmg and enchantment dmg to 20 each

added the \"better nightingale enchantment\"
that changed the nightingale helmet from cheaper ilusiun spells to more dmg with bows and the nightingale armor from frost recistance and more stamina to frost recistance and harder to detect when sneaking and changed the nightingale gloves from easierlockpicking to douple dmg when backstapping

added the \"Ancient shrouded armor harder to detect when sneaking\"
that changed to 100 poison resistance to 25, 50 or 100% harder to detect when sneaking

added the \"shrouded armor better pickpocket\"
that changed the ancient shrouded armor from 50 percent poison recistance to 25, 50, 75 or 100% easier pickpocketing


Ver. 2.1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"better nightingale enchantment alternate gloves\"
that does the same thing as the \"better nightingale enchant added in ver. 2 but where the gloves have both the defualt 25% more dmg with 1h weps AND the new douple backstap dmg
if u want to use this make sure its loaded AFTER the \"better nightingale enchantment\"

V. 3.0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"better nightingale enchantent + theifs guild armor enchantment\"
this have the same enchantments as the nightinglae better enchantems and then also have the enchantments as the theifs guild masters armor

v3.2.0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"better nightingale armor enchantment plus theves guild master armor and nighteye\" that does the same as \"better nightingale armor enchantment plus theves guild master armor\" but where the helm also gives nighteye

V3.3.0
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"nightingale overpowered cheating verion\"
this is the nightinglae armor with the following enchantments:
Armor: 500% harder to detect
Hood: +100% bow damage, +100 magicka, health, fatigue
Gloves: pickpocket success 500% better, double backstab dmg, double 1H damage, double 2 h dmg
Boots: Muffle, 100% resist poison & disease, +250 carrying capacity

added \"nightingale armor with enchants from ciceros armour\"

V3.50
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"slightly improved nightingale bow\"

this increases each of the leveled nightingale bows with + 2 base dmg 5% archery dmg (5,10,15,20 amd 25) and chance for 1 sec paralyze per lvl (1,2,3,4 and 5)

v 3.60
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added wrightless nightingale armour
this makes the nightingale armour completly weightless and is compatiple with all the nightingale versions here so download this to make them weight less and another to make them have the enchantment u want

v 4.00
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
dawnbreaker allow disenchant
this simply allows u to disenchant sawnbreaker and get its epic enchantment on your other weapons this is also compatiple with my \"dawnbreaker stronger enchantment\"

V5
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Added the \"aprintices robes with master destruction robees enchantment\"
this changes the aperintices robes enchantment with the one from master destruction robes

V5.1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mikaelarps Alternate enchantments Complete
This is just all of the changes in one file then u can just take whatever of them u want i am offcourse going to keep this updated

v6.00
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------added \"alternate archmages robees enchant\"
does so archmages robes gives 22 cheaper restoration and destruction spells and + 150 mana regen

v6.5
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------added the ancient shrouded armor fix
this should make the 100% harder  to deteck ancient shrouded armor work as planned

v7
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added better saviors hide
this will give the saviors hide 8 more armor and 20 instead of 15 spell resistance

v8
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added weightless nightingale amor with deadric armor stats
this just makes nightingale amor weigh nothing and have as much armor as deadric
added dragonscale amor with op one handed dmg buff this make the normaly unenchanted dragonscale armour be enchanted with 134327% more dmg with one handed

v9
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
added the \"alternate better nightingale enchantments\" 
this will give the nightingale amour the following enchantments
Nightingale Armor - Pickpocket success is +25% better + Carrying capacity increased by 35 points 
Nightingale Boots - Wearer is muffled and moves silently + You are 25% harder to detect
 Nightingale Gloves - Double sneak attack damage with one-handed weapons + Lockpicking is 25% easier 
Nightingale Hood - Bows do 35% more damage + 25% One-Handed Damage Increase
 

--CREDITS--

Theese are the guys u can thank for the ideas for some of the items

Reaper004
The idea for the \"better nightingale enchantment\"

ryokox3
For telling me it didnt cover Ancient shrouded armor and there for responsiple for the     
 \"ancient shrouded armor harder to detect when sneaking\"

faricho
For the idea to make the \"shrouded armor pickpocket edition\"
and \"alternate arch mages enchant\"

sadhukar
For the idea to make the stronger dawn breaker enchantment
for asking for the better saviors hide

Syler51
for the idea to make the \"better nightingale enchantment alternate gloves\"

damania
for requesting the \"nightingale better enchantemen + theifs guild master enchantent\"
and the \"better nightingale armor enchantment plus theves guild master armor and nighteye\"

iaotle
for the \"overpowered cheating version\"
and for the \"weightless nightingale armour\"
and the \"weightless nightingale armor with dreadic armor stats\"
and the \"dragonscale armor with op one handed dmg\"

A1ta1r 
for the \"nightingale with ciceros armor enchantment\"
for the \"slightly improved nightingale bow\"

jamoroon 
for sugesting the \"dawnbreaker allow disenchant\"

Azuremight
for requesting the aperintices robes with master destruction robes enchantment

uptodown
For suggesting the \"mikaelarps alternate enchantments complete pack\"

Vindicatum
for telling me that the ancient shrouded armor didnt work

If u liked this mod then try looking at some of my other mods :D
